org.ljtoolkit.data
Class Event

java.lang.Object
  org.ljtoolkit.data.Event

public class Event
extends java.lang.Object

The Event class represents the data associated with a Live Journal event.

Author:
Troy Bourdon

getSecurity

public EventSecurity getSecurity()
(Optional) Specifies who can read this post. Valid values are public (default), private and usemask. When value is usemask, viewability is controlled by the allowmask.

Returns:
EventSecurity

setSecurity

public void setSecurity(EventSecurity security)
Set the security level to be used for a Live Journal post.

Parameters:
security - The event security

getAllowmask

public int getAllowmask()
Relevant when EventSecurity is USEMASK. A 32-bit unsigned integer representing which of the user's groups of friends are allowed to view this post. Turn bit 0 on to allow any defined friend to read it. Otherwise, turn bit 1-30 on for every friend group that should be allowed to read it Bit 31 is reserved.

Returns:
int

setAllowmask

public void setAllowmask(int allowmask)
Set the allowmask.

Parameters:
allowmask -

getSubject

public java.lang.String getSubject()
The subject for this post. Limited to 255 characters. No newlines.

Returns:
String

public void setSubject(java.lang.String subject)
